termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.introduction: Welcome to Memora Music. By using our platform, you agree to the following terms and conditions of use.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Memora Music, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Memora Music is a platform that allows users to create personalized music using artificial intelligence. Our service transforms your memories and emotions into unique musical compositions.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: To use certain features of the service, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for all activities that occur under your account.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The music created through Memora Music is owned by you. However, you grant us a limited license to process and deliver the content as necessary to provide the service.

prohibitedUses.title: 5. Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.content: You may not use the service to create illegal, offensive, defamatory content or content that violates third-party rights. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms.

limitation.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Memora Music is provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

modifications.title: 7. Terms Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at: contact@memoramusic.com

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy – Memora Music
privacyPolicy.introduction: Memora Music by Twing values your privacy. This Policy clearly explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data, including Google account data when you choose to use Google login.

dataCollected.title: 1. Data Collected
dataCollected.content:
1.1 Data provided by the user:
• Name, email, and password when creating an account directly.
• Briefing information, musical preferences, and chosen styles to generate personalized songs.

1.2 Data collected via Google login (Google OAuth):
When you choose to register or access your account with Google, we may access:
• First and last name.
• Email address.
• Profile picture (if available).

This data is used only for authentication and creating the Memora Music account.

1.3 Usage and technical data:
• Information about interactions with the platform (songs created, versions chosen).
• Technical data such as IP address, device type, browser, and cookies.

1.4 Payment data:
In case of purchases, payment data is processed by partners (e.g., Stripe). Memora Music does not store complete card information.

dataUse.title: 2. How We Use the Data
dataUse.content:
• Authentication and access: name, email, and Google profile picture are used exclusively to authenticate your account.
• Experience personalization: we use data provided in the briefing to generate personalized songs.
• Communication: we may send notifications about orders, updates, and improvements.
• Platform improvement: we analyze usage metrics to enhance the experience.
• Legal compliance: we use data when necessary to comply with applicable laws.

dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
• We do not sell or rent personal data to third parties.
• Data may be shared with:
• Service providers (hosting, payment processing, technical support).
• Authentication partners (Google, only for secure login).
• Legal authorities when required by law.

dataStorage.title: 4. Data Storage and Protection
dataStorage.content:
• All data is stored on secure servers in compliance with LGPD (Brazil) and GDPR (Europe).
• We implement technical and organizational measures, including encryption in transit (TLS/SSL) and at rest.
• Access to data is restricted only to authorized employees or service providers.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention and Deletion
dataRetention.content:
• Account data and created songs are kept while your account is active.
• If you request deletion, all your personal data (including data obtained via Google login) will be permanently deleted from our systems, except when retention is necessary for legal obligation.
• To request deletion, contact us at: privacidade@memoramusic.com or use the 'Delete account' function on the platform itself.

userRights.title: 6. User Rights
userRights.content:
You can, at any time:
• Request access, correction, or deletion of your data.
• Withdraw consent for certain uses.
• Request data portability.
• Object to processing in certain situations.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Technologies
cookies.content:
• We use functional, analytical, and preference cookies.
• You can manage cookies in your browser settings or in our consent banner.

internationalTransfer.title: 8. International Data Transfer
internationalTransfer.content: Your data may be processed outside Brazil or the European Union. We ensure that any transfer will be made in accordance with LGPD and GDPR, with adequate safeguards.

changes.title: 9. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this Policy periodically. The most recent version will always be available at https://memora.music/politica-de-privacidade.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For questions or requests related to this Policy, please contact: contato@memora.music
